record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name="cm3t" and term=NULL and format.name="cm3t.hdr1" and syslanguage="en"
record.file.name: cm3t
record.format.name: cm3t.hdr1

brief.brief: This form enables you to specify criteria that qualify the search.
Specify your search criteria and press Enter.

detail.detail: The search returns a list of records that match the criteria you specify:
- Press Enter to restrict the search to Open Tasks.
- Select History to restrict the search to Closed Tasks.
- Select Deferred to restrict the search to Deferred Tasks.
- Select All to search for all Tasks regardless of status.
- Select Approve to start the approval process.
- Select Review to start the Review process.
- Select Query to display the SQL for modification.
- Select End to return to the last displayed Menu.
